001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class or method as participating in the
007 * <b>Template Method</b> design pattern.
008 * <p>
009 * The Template Method is a behavioral design pattern that defines the
010 * <i>skeleton of an algorithm</i> in a base class (the template) while
011 * allowing subclasses to redefine specific steps without changing the
012 * overall algorithm structure.
013 */
014@Documented
015@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.EXTENSIBILITY)
016@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
017@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
018public @interface TemplateMethod {
019
020}
